headline: Allegion to Attend 2025 Bank of America Global Industrials Conference
summary: DUBLIN, March 12, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE) Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer Mike Wagnes will discuss the company’s long-term strategy at the 2025 Bank of America Global Industrials Conference on Wednesday, March 19. The conference will be held at The Landmark Hotel in London.
